title: Lowell National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons            June 13- September 5, 2016                 September 6- October 10, 2016 October 11- November 26, 2016   Visitor Center  Open Daily:  9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Open Daily:  9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m Open Daily:  9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.   Boott Cotton Mills Museum Open Daily:  9:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m Open Daily: 9:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m Open Daily:  9:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.   Mill Girls and Immigrants Exhibit Open Daily: 11 a.m.- 5:00 p.m. Open Daily: 1:30 p.m.- 5:00 p.m. Open Daily: 1:30 p.m. - 5:00 p.m.   Mill and Trolley Tour Daily: 2:30 p.m. at the Visitor Center Monday - Friday: 2:30 p.m. at the Boott Cotton Mills Saturday & Sunday: 2:30 p.m. at the Visitor Center   Canal Boat Tours Daily: 11:00 a.m., 2:00 p.m. 12:00 noon, 3:00 p.m.  Weekends: 11:00 a.m., 12:00 noon 2:00 p.m., 3:00 p.m.  Boat Tours Return in May 2017   Northern Canal Walkway Opens Daily: Water Levels permitting  Open Daily until Oct. 15- Water Levels permitting  Closed for the Season                  Download the 2016 Summer Lowell Offering, your Lowell map and guide to tour schedules, exhibit opening times, and special events.
